short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to collect information from LinkedIn profiles and save on Beehire

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate Your Hiring Process with Seamless Candidate Sourcing

Beehire Sourcing is a Chrome extension that allows you to add candidates' profiles from LinkedIn to your Beehire account easily. No more manual data entry or time-consuming copy-pasting. Our Chrome extension automates the process of extracting key details from LinkedIn, allowing you to focus on what truly matters - evaluating and selecting the best candidates for your team.

When you see a potential candidate:

1️⃣ Go to their profile

2️⃣ Click on “Add profile”

3️⃣ And voilà! The candidate has been added to your Beehire account
